titleInfo.title: To amend title VIII of the Public Health Service Act to extend advanced education nursing grants to support clinical nurse specialist programs, and for other purposes.
Title VIII Nursing Workforce Reauthorization Act of 2016

extension.shortTitle: Title VIII Nursing Workforce Reauthorization Act of 2016
extension.officialTitle: To amend title VIII of the Public Health Service Act to extend advanced education nursing grants to support clinical nurse specialist programs, and for other purposes.
extension.action: Mrs. Capps (for herself and Mr. Joyce) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

Additional sponsors: Mr. Clay, Ms. Lofgren, Mr. Grijalva, Mr. Capuano, Mrs. Torres, Mr. Rangel, Mr. Conyers, Mr. Farr, Ms. Bordallo, Ms. Brown of Florida, Mr. Rodney Davis of Illinois, Mr. Takano, Mr. Yarmuth, Ms. Roybal-Allard, Ms. Plaskett, Mr. Higgins, Mr. Lewis, Mr. Blumenauer, Mr. Takai, Ms. Slaughter, Mr. Courtney, Mr. Keating, Ms. Matsui, Ms. Eddie Bernice Johnson of Texas, Ms. Bonamici, Mrs. Dingell, Ms. Pingree, Mr. Peters, Ms. Judy Chu of California, Ms. Frankel of Florida, Mr. Cicilline, Miss Rice of New York, Mr. Smith of Texas, Ms. Brownley of California, Mr. Kennedy, Ms. Castor of Florida, Mr. Cummings, Mr. Lynch, Mr. Beyer, Mr. Lipinski, Mr. Walz, Ms. Bass, Mr. Fattah, Mr. Schrader, Mr. Schiff, Mr. Loebsack, Mr. Brendan F. Boyle of Pennsylvania, Mr. Aguilar, Mr. Ashford, Mr. DeFazio, Mr. Delaney, Mr. Young of Alaska, Ms. Graham, Mr. Norcross, Mr. Rooney of Florida, Ms. Moore, Ms. McCollum, Mr. Hastings, Mrs. Napolitano, Ms. Meng, Mr. DeSaulnier, Mr. Costello of Pennsylvania, Mr. Brady of Pennsylvania, Mr. Al Green of Texas, Ms. Duckworth, Mr. Meehan, Ms. Wasserman Schultz, Mr. Thompson of Mississippi, Ms. Kaptur, Mr. McKinley, Ms. Edwards, and Ms. Norton
Reported with an amendment, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union, and ordered to be printed
